Package api.gbuild.component.dialog

This package provides the implementation of movable dialogs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GDialog
    Dialog component which is movable This class was designed to offer to developers an easy way to build dialogs that can incorporate to its content lots of different components.
    GDialogWithText
    Dialog that contains a text as the content This dialog includes at the bottom part of the component a text passed by the developer.

Package api.gbuild.component.dialog Description

This package provides the implementation of movable dialogs.

By the use of simple graphical components, dialogs are created at gBuild to be customizable. That is to say, Processing debelopers can customize the content of a dialog to have a specific appearance.

Relative to the movement, dialogs can be defined to be static or dynamic. The first type of component won't move from its location if content is not updated, while the second one would move according to the mouse pointer location. Besides, gBuild includes the possibility to define modal dialogs by the use of newDialog constant defined at the globals section of api.gbuild package.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
2.0.1
